summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and providing logical reasoning and actionable fixes, with minor omissions in metric precision and causal chain completeness.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the MMDVFS OPP3 and CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issues as root causes.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and clearly explains the issues with MMDVFS and voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant to the identified issues.
